content: suzee knits chunky monkey beanie one size - adult female materials 130g the women s institute soft & chunky yarn or similar 100g will be enough if you are not making a pompom 8mm and 9mm short 16 circular needle plus longer cable for magic loop method 1 stitch marker large sewing needle to weave in ends abbreviations pm - place marker k1 -knit one p1 - purl one round - round k2tog - knit two together p2tog - purl two together sts - stitches pattern using 8mm circular needle cast on 60 sts using the long tail cast on method pm and join in the round work 5 in k1 p1 rib switch to 9mm needles and proceed with mock rib pattern as follows round 1 - *k2 p2 repeat from* round 2 - k1 *p2 k2 repeat from * to last 3 sts p2 k1 continue in pattern for 5 ending with a round 2 switch to a longer cable and using magic loop method work decreases as follows round 1 - *k2 p2tog repeat from* 45sts round 2 - k1 *p1 k2 repeat from* to last 2 sts p1 k1 round 3 - *k1 p2tog repeat from* 30sts round 4 - *k1 p1 repeat from* round 5 - *k2tog repeat from* 15sts round 6 - knit all sts round 7 - k1 *k2tog repeat from* 8sts round 8 - *k2tog repeat from* 4sts using a large sewing needle weave end through the remaining 4sts draw together and push end through the center between the stitches weave in ends optional - make large pompom and sew on securely
